definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

sentences.english: Oily skin after bathing, every mind and the body fluent in its landscaping.
sentences.chinese: 洗浴后皮肤油腻，浑身舒畅，气血通顺，心旷神怡。

sentences.english: The same principle may make for smoother writing.
sentences.chinese: 这同一原则也可使文章写得更通顺。

sentences.english: Go over that contract with a fine-tooth comb before you agree to anything.
sentences.chinese: 检查一下，在签订之前确定合同上各项条款通顺有理。

sentences.english: His interpretation is coherent and intelligible.
Comb clear and coherent, natural air, after air can restorable .
sentences.chinese: 梳理通顺，自然晾干，晾干后即可恢复原状。

sentences.english: Felt that this biggest advantage, is lets me drain smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 感觉这最大的好处，是让我排泄通顺。

sentences.english: Talents are the primary source of TOSO.
sentences.chinese: 人才，是通顺的第一资源。

definition: to rhyme/sometimes written 壓韻|压韵
to express or convey one's ideas
to link up (disparate elements)/coherent (narrative, argument etc)
to pause at appropriate points in reading aloud unpunctuated writing/to punctuate
context/the surrounding words/same as 上下文
antithesis (two lines of poetry matching in sense and sound)/to fight/to wage war
